data.title: 5 Movies Starring the Extremely Beautiful Actress Thandie Newton
data.meta_description: She was nominated for a Golden Globe in the Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role in a Series, Limited Series or Motion Picture Made for Television category.
data.text:
This is the third article in an ongoing series about the most beautiful actors and actresses in Hollywood.

Brief Introduction

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton is currently playing the role of an evil robot called Maeve Millay in the science fiction western thriller television series Westworld created by Academy Award nominee Jonathan Nolan and Lisa Joy for HBO.

Westworld is currently in the position number twenty on the list of the greatest television shows ever made according to IMDB, an Amazon subsidiary.

Evan Rachel Wood was nominated back in 2016 for a Golden Globe in the Best Performance by an Actress in a Television Series - Drama category for her hard work in this television show.

Here are a few good films starring Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton.

Two-time Academy Award nominee Viggo Mortensen and Academy Award nominee Harvey Keitel star in this 1993 crime drama film.

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton plays the role of Rachael Stevens.

John Harris is a cop from the United States of America who travels to London to arrest or kill Carl Frazer, the gang leader of several sociopathic teenagers obsessed with American culture.

In the film, Carl Frazer played by two-time Academy Award nominee Viggo Mortensen finds and recruits troubled kids to build his own small kingdom.

Every King needs at the very least a small army if he wants to conquer some land for himself or in this case if he wants to make some money illegally.

It does not matter if you want to become the next Joaquín Guzmán or the next Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi or in this case, a gang leader controlling a few blocks somewhere in the United Kingdom.

You need crazy people willing to murder for you and willing to obey your orders if you want to build a criminal empire and you cannot recruit employees currently doing time like in the old days because you may hire the next Whitey Bulger.

The FBI has a very stupid rule: They are not allowed to hire anybody under 23 years of age.

The bad guys know this and they know you are not an undercover FBI agent if you are young.

Foot soldiers are getting younger and younger every year. We are now used to this after watching films and television shows with children committing crimes like Beasts of No Nation, Sin Nombre, The Wire, and Thirteen.

However, the film The Young Americans preceded all these films by many years.

Unsupervised teenagers can be extremely hazardous to your health.

If you happen to be a parent of a teenager please watch this film and learn about the dangers of hanging out with thirsty for blood characters like Carl Frazer.

Back in the day when I was younger the worst thing that could happen to your teenager daughter was to get impregnated with a baby by one of the Sons of Anarchy.

Now they are robbing banks just for kicks.

Three-time Academy Award nominee Tom Cruise, Golden Globe winner Ving Rhames, and three-time Golden Globe nominee Brendan Gleeson star in this 2000 action spy film directed by Chinese director, screenwriter, and producer John Woo.

After the critical and financial success of the 1996 action spy film Mission: Impossible produced with a budget of $80 million, Paramount Pictures decided to increase the budget for the sequel to $125 million.

This film was a huge financial success with global ticket sales of more than $546 million.

In fact, this was the biggest movie of the year back in 2000.

Paramount Pictures increased the budget for the second sequel Mission: Impossible III back in 2006 yet again. This time to $150 million.

Tom Cruise and Simon Pegg worked together in Mission: Impossible III, Mission: Impossible Ghost Protocol, and Mission: Impossible Rogue Nation.

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton plays the beautiful and extremely dangerous thief Nyah Nordoff-Hall.

Academy Award winner Christopher McQuarrie is directing Mission: Impossible 6 as we speak.

Golden Globe nominee Rebecca Ferguson is playing the role of Ilsa Faust one more time.

Mission: Impossible 6 is currently scheduled to be released by Paramount Pictures on July 27, 2018.

You can stream this film right now if you are a Cinemax (NYSE: T ) subscriber.

You can also stream this film right now if you happen to live in Japan, India, Denmark, the United Kingdom, Sweden, Ireland, Finland, Norway, France, New Zealand, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Russia, Poland, or South Korea and you are a Netflix subscriber.

Academy Award winner Richard Dreyfuss, Academy Award nominees Josh Brolin and James Cromwell, Golden Globe nominees Colin Hanks and Toby Jones, and Scott Glenn star in this 2008 biographical drama film based on the life and presidency of George W. Bush directed by three-time Academy Award winner Oliver Stone.

This film was made with a modest budget of only $25.1 million.

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton plays the role of Condoleezza Rice.

You can stream this film right now if you happen to live in Australia or New Zealand and you are a Netflix subscriber.

Gabrielle Union and Jamie Kennedy star in this American romantic drama film written, co-produced, directed, and starring Tyler Perry.

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton plays the role of Lindsey Wakefield, a single mother and cleaner working for the Deeds Corporation and she is about to get evicted.

You need at least one credit card for emergencies, just in case you lose your job.

Wesley Deeds is the founder of the Deeds Corporation and he is engaged to Natalie .

If you like films where the millionaires are in love with a poor girl then you are going to like this one.

This film was released back in 2012 by Lionsgate. (NYSE: LGF) and it was a commercial success for them with global ticket sales of more than $35 million which is a lot if you consider this film was produced by Tyler Perry Studios with a modest budget of only $14 million.

Golden Globe nominees John Leguizamo and Hayden Christensen star in this 2010 American post-apocalyptic thriller produced with a micro-budget of only $10 million.

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton plays the role of Rosemary.

You can stream this film right now if you are a Monsters & Nightmares subscriber.

Conclusion

Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton has a very busy schedule for the next couple of years and her current net worth of $17.5 million is likely to increase at the very least to $35 million in a few years.

Academy Award winner Charlize Theron, Two-time Golden Globe nominee David Oyelowo, Golden Globe nominee Joel Edgerton, and Golden Globe nominee Thandie Newton star in the action film American Express coming soon to a theater near you.

Adele, Academy Award winners Natalie Portman, Kathy Bates, and Susan Sarandon , Two-time Academy Award nominee Jessica Chastain, Golden Globe nominees Michael Gambon and Thandie Newton, and Emmy Award nominee Kit Harington star in the drama film The Death and Life of John F. Donovan coming in 2018 to a theater near you.
